0.Title: The Creator's House
0.Descipt: Its characteristics are: yang excess weight, energy excess, effort, creativity, awareness, time-consuming, fighting, struggle, creation, creation, spirituality.

1.Title: The Host's House
1.Descipt: Characteristics: yin excess weight, inclusion, adaptation, transfer, expansion, surrender, form, material, spatial experience.

2.Title: The Exciter's House
2.Descipt: Characteristics: sudden movement, unexpected impulses and impulses, mobility, vitality, initiation, lifting, stimulation, fertilization.

3.Title: House of Serenity
3.Descipt: Its characteristics are: emotional attitude, letting go and attraction, comfort and lack, happiness, serenity, joy, kindness, feeding.

4.Title: The House of the Gentle
4.Descipt: Characteristics: penetration, loading, muttering, mummification, growth, development, penetration, perpendibility, susceptibility, assimilation, breaking, progress.

5.Title: The House of Motionless
5.Descipt: Characteristics: down or down, stopping, restraint, obstruction, strength, finishing, perfection, calm, peaceful standing.

6.Title: House of Danger
6.Descipt: Its features: moving on, getting out of something, getting over something, exertion, pain, cellular forces, cold, fluidity, bottomless, dangerous, deep, emotion, erosion.

7.Title: The House of Sticky
7.Descipt: Its characteristics are: adhesion and remission, attachment, ascension and decline, cohesiveness and letting go, solar forces, visuality, thinking, union and separation.

Jellem.10: It shows the basics of character, harmonious transformation, the right way of conducting and organizing habits. Reaches your goal.
Jellem.15: The treatment of character and the desire to train character. Respect and illuminate.
Jellem.24: A jellem törzsét mutatja, amely önismerethez és önvizsgálathoz vezet. Kicsi, mégis eltér a külső dolgoktól.
Jellem.32: It shows the solidity of character and serves the unity of character. It refers to a multifaceted and unblemished experience.
Jellem.41: It shows the nurturing, restraining, and dominating of character that keeps the damage at bay. The difficulty is followed by the easy.
Jellem.42: It shows the abundance and fullness of character and promotes the useful. It indicates fullness without artificial grips.
Jellem.47: It shows the challenge of character, and through it we learn how to reduce our anger. It leads to confusion and thus leads to success.
Jellem.48: It cultivates the soil of character and helps distinguish the right from the wrong. It stays in its place, and yet it always affects others.
Jellem.57: It shows the activity of character when it is able to take into account special things and to be able to weigh and remain hidden.

Taplalas.5: It indicates material nourishment and nourishment.
Taplalas.27: It indicates spiritual nourishment and nourishment.

Tars.31: It's about a young couple's relationship.
Tars.32: It relates to the relationship of an elderly couple.
Tars.53: It shows a gradual approximation when a young man places himself under an older woman.
Tars.54: It shows a part when a young girl follows the older boy.

Kozosseg.7: A warrior community of strong men.
Kozosseg.8: A community established for a purpose.
Kozosseg.14: A community united by a gentle leader.
Kozosseg.45: A religious or spiritual congregation or community.
